dim:dim.dim:field: University of Michigan., Penny W. Stamps School of Art and Design

To access this archived Website, download the .ZIP file and extract the contents with the utility of your choice. Using a Web browser, open the 'BHL-start-here.html' file found within to review additional information from the Bentley Historical Library and follow a link to view the archived homepage.

Archived version of the School of Art and Design website as it appeared on May 22, 2008. Documents the academic programs, accomplishments, resources, events, and people at the School of Art and Design. Content includes important news and announcements, publications such as student handbooks, and information about admissions, curriculum, degree requirements, outreach/engagement, exhibits, facilities, alumni relations and development, and the overall mission of the School. Also included is the website for the 'work : detroit' gallery, which includes news and announcements as well as information about exhibitions and the mission of the gallery.
Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan
